Posts.Content: My name is Maggi G.  I am 55 years old and had a bilateral mastectomy on 9-22-08. I chose to have implants instead of breast reconstruction.  Since then I have had Post Mastectomy Pain Syndrome.- burning, tightness, pain, pain, pain. I live in Pittsburgh but would travel anywhere in the world to find a physician to treat me using nerve blocks (neurilysis) and or any other treatment other than the ones that i have tried and have not worked for me: Oinments Cymbalta Acupuncture Hypotherapy Physical therapy Narcotics - these are helpful, but I don't want to be on them the rest of my life If you know of a pain center or specific doctor that knows and treat PMPS, please respond to me via email or phone: --Message edited by CancerCompass staff. For personal protection, email address removed. Consider private reply. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html--
Posts.Title: POST MASTECTOMY PAIN SYNDROME
